properties.description:
From a domain list, it will permute every domain and return the registered domains with those permutations. 
Then it will investigate such domains to find any event on the local network that has seen this cousin domains. 

If so, it will send an email with the domain name and details.

properties.script:
t = $workflow.definition_workflow_01Z729SGB27JG4escJqhmxQ6YXGU5wGy8jp.local.variable_workflow_01Z729SGH7QYK5xp3vFteb6kcczBVyuoYeK$
#example = "URL/Domain = login.com\n"
t1, t2, t3,f = ""
for i in t:
  t1 = "What was seen?\nURL/Domain = "+i['observables']+"\nSource = "+i['source']+"\n"
  t2 = "Sighting type = "+i['targets'][0]['type']+"\n"
  t3 = "Details:\nTime ="+i['targets'][0]['observed_time']['start_time']+"\n"
  f = f+t1+t2+t3

properties.body:
Hey! 

In our analysis we found an potential threat using a cousing domain of your registered domains.
You can click in the Investigate URL of each observable for more details on the incident. 

Please, find below the details:
$workflow.definition_workflow_01Z729SGB27JG4escJqhmxQ6YXGU5wGy8jp.local.variable_workflow_01ZBJNYZHKNAG79vRWPcfhUTGRox4gRwt1r$


Go to your secureX Threat Response and check this observables.

properties.description: the /observe works better with up to 50 observables
properties.script:
import json

temp = $workflow.definition_workflow_01Z729SITTMHN5i7KyB5TWyL5x34W5AAHhg.input.variable_workflow_01Z729SJ7D25U0f9cZYEcFupy3okJbLJc3a$
i = $workflow.definition_workflow_01Z729SITTMHN5i7KyB5TWyL5x34W5AAHhg.local.variable_workflow_01Z729SJ7DGXB20CnIsB1XzYtdYHWHHEguL$
total = $activity.definition_activity_01Z729SKE548V7XKlUYY37pQazAwDzVKYuR.output.script_queries.total$

if i == total-1:
  current1 = temp[50*i:]
else:
  current1 = temp[50*i:50*(i+1)]

current = json.dumps(current1)
print(len(current))

properties.script:
import json

obs = $activity.definition_activity_01Z729SPKQ78L4Hs6qA7xqRUwFOjzUUqMy0.output.jsonpath_queries.observables$
targs = $activity.definition_activity_01Z729SPKQ78L4Hs6qA7xqRUwFOjzUUqMy0.output.jsonpath_queries.targets$
srcs = $activity.definition_activity_01Z729SPKQ78L4Hs6qA7xqRUwFOjzUUqMy0.output.jsonpath_queries.source$
sights = $workflow.definition_workflow_01Z729SITTMHN5i7KyB5TWyL5x34W5AAHhg.local.variable_workflow_01Z729SJ7CQXM6tN163CHPiu4zQZ7G17Rla$
for i in range(0,len(obs)):
  nc = {'observables': obs[i],'source': srcs[i],'targets': targs[i]}
  sights.append(nc)
